name: FlipPix Art - Inventions
description:
Our Book of Inventions depicts colorful puzzles from the eras of Radios and Rockets, Steam Engines, Televisions, Computers, and more. FlipPix Art – Inventions has 240 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 20x20.

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art puzzles are designed for both phones and tablets.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
